greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers generated by 3-rowed array shown below.
comment: Reversing the direction of the diagonals gives A143097. - _Jeremy Gardiner_, Oct 14 2012.
reference: M. Cerasoli, F. Eugeni and M. Protasi, Elementi di Matematica Discreta, Bologna 1988
Emanuele Munarini and Norma Zagaglia Salvi, Matematica Discreta,UTET, CittaStudiEdizioni, Milano 1997
formula: For n > 1, a(n+5) = a(n) + 6, iff a(n+5)<a(n): a(n+3k) = a(n) + 3k with k >=1.
results.author: _Giovanni Teofilatto_, Mar 05 2006
